changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION get_address(address1 text, address2 text, city text, zipcode text) returns text LANGUAGE SQL AS $$ SELECT ( substring(CONCAT_WS(', ', NULLIF(TRIM(address1), ''), NULLIF(TRIM(address2), ''), NULLIF(TRIM(city), ''), NULLIF(TRIM(zipcode), '') ) FROM 1 FOR 255) ) $$
